battle_traits.name: Gargant Charge
battle_traits.declare: Pick a friendly Mega‑Gargant or Gargant unit that charged this turn and has not used a Rampage ability this turn to use this ability, then pick a visible enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
battle_traits.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

battle_traits.name: Jump Up and Down
battle_traits.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
battle_traits.declare: Pick a friendly Mega‑Gargant or Gargant unit that has not used a Rampage ability this turn to use this ability, then pick an enemy Infantry unit in combat with it to be the target.
battle_traits.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, roll a dice for each model in the target unit. If the unit using this ability is a Gargant, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target for each 6. If it is a Mega-Gargant, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target for each 5+.

battle_traits.name: Colossal Slam
battle_traits.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
battle_traits.declare: Pick a friendly Mega‑Gargant that has not used a Rampage ability this turn to use this ability, then pick an enemy Monster or War Machine within 1" of it to be the target.
battle_traits.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, remove the target from the battlefield and set it up again within 1" of the unit using this ability. Then, inflict D3 mortal damage on the target.

battle_traits.name: Earthshaking Roar
battle_traits.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
battle_traits.declare: Pick a friendly Mega‑Gargant or Gargant unit that has not used a Rampage ability this turn to use this ability, then pick an enemy unit in combat with it to be the target.
battle_traits.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target cannot use commands for the rest of the turn.

battle_traits.name: Timberrrrr!
battle_traits.effect: Each time a friendly Mega‑Gargant or Gargant model is slain, before removing it from play, the players must roll off. The winner picks a point on the battlefield within 3" of that model. Inflict D3 mortal damage on each unit (friendly and enemy) within 3" of that point that has a lower Health characteristic than that model.

Boss Tribe.name: Big Mouth
Boss Tribe.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Reaction: You declared a Fight ability for a friendly Mega-Gargant
Boss Tribe.effect: Pick a friendly Gargant unit that has not used a Fight ability this turn and is wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target. The target can be picked to use a Fight ability immediately after the Fight ability used by this unit has been resolved.

Breaker Tribe.name: Besieging Bulk
Breaker Tribe.effect: Friendly Mega-Gargants have Ward (6+) while they are within the combat ranges of any other friendly Mega-Gargants.

Stomper Tribe.name: Revel in War
Stomper Tribe.effect: You can pick 2 friendly Mega‑Gargants or Gargant units that have not used a Rampage ability this turn to use the ‘Jump Up and Down’ ability instead of 1.

Taker Tribe.name: More Stuff For Me Collection
Taker Tribe.declare: Pick a friendly non-Unique Sons of Behemat Hero that does not have an artefact of power.
Taker Tribe.effect:
Give that Hero 1 artefact of power from ‘Titanic Trophies’.

Designer’s Note: This artefact of power is given to the unit during the deployment phase, not during army composition.

heroic_traits.name: Rabble Rouser
heroic_traits.effect: Add 1 to charge rolls for friendly Sons of Behemat units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

heroic_traits.name: Furious Temper
heroic_traits.activation: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
heroic_traits.effect:
For the rest of the turn:

• Add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons.
• Subtract 1 from save rolls for this unit.

heroic_traits.name: Monstrously Tough
heroic_traits.effect: This unit has a Health characteristic of 40 instead of 35.

artefacts_of_power.name: Glowy Lantern
artefacts_of_power.effect: Pick 1 manifestation lore available to your faction. This unit can use Summon abilities from that manifestation lore as if it had Wizard (1).

artefacts_of_power.name: Amberstone Totem
artefacts_of_power.activation: Once Per Battle, Your Charge Phase
artefacts_of_power.effect: For the rest of the turn, this unit can use Charge abilities even if it used a Run ability in the same turn.

artefacts_of_power.name: Mantle of Tusk and Horns
artefacts_of_power.activation: Once Per Battle, Your Combat Phase
artefacts_of_power.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks made by friendly Sons of Behemat units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

artefacts_of_power.name: Extra-calloused Feet
artefacts_of_power.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic, Rend characteristic and Damage characteristic of this unit’s Almighty Stomp or Almightier Stomp.

artefacts_of_power.name: Kingslaughter Cowl
artefacts_of_power.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons while this unit is in combat with an enemy Hero.

artefacts_of_power.name: Glowy Shield of Protectiness
artefacts_of_power.effect: Each time you make an unmodified save roll of 6 for a combat attack that targets this unit, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the Fight ability has been resolved.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of The Dread Mace is 4 and this unit has a Control characteristic of 10.

abilities.name: The Shield Inviolate
abilities.activation: Reaction: Opponent declared a Spell ability
abilities.effect: If this unit was picked to be the target of that spell, roll a dice. On a 3+, ignore the effect of that spell on this unit. This unit can use this ability more than once per phase but only once per Spell ability.

abilities.name: Rampaging Destruction
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
abilities.effect:
If this unit charged this phase, pick 1 of the following effects:

• Roll a dice for each enemy unit within 1" of this unit. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the roll.
• Pick an enemy Monster in combat with this unit and roll 2D6. On a 7, this ability has no effect. Otherwise, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the results on the dice used for the 2D6 roll multiplied together. For example, a 2D6 roll of 2 and 6 would inflict 12 mortal damage (2x6).

abilities.name: The End of Empires
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for friendly Destruction units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit, to a maximum of 3.

abilities.name: Avatar of Destruction
abilities.effect: If this unit would be automatically destroyed, it is not automatically destroyed. Instead, allocate 6 damage points to it (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

warscrolls.name: Gatebreaker Mega-Gargant

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 15 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Fortcrusha Flail is 4 and this unit has a Control characteristic of 10.

abilities.name: Longshanks
abilities.effect: This unit can pass through models in non-Monster units and parts of terrain features that are less than 4" tall.

abilities.name: Pulverising Strike
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: This unit can make a pile-in move. Then, roll a dice. On a 4+, inflict 4D6 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Smash Down
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a terrain feature within 3" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: If the target is Faction Terrain, inflict D3+3 mortal damage on it. Then, roll a D3 for each non-Monster unit (friendly and enemy) within 3" of the target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Sons of Behemat
abilities.effect: If this unit would be automatically destroyed, it is not automatically destroyed. Instead, allocate 6 damage points to it (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

warscrolls.notes: This Hero can join an eligible regiment as an Eager Lout.

abilities.name: Keep Up!
abilities.effect: While this unit is wholly within 12" of a friendly Mega-Gargant, this unit can use Charge abilities even if it used a Run ability in the same turn.

abilities.name: Stuff 'Em In Me Bag
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn, Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll is at least double the target’s Health characteristic, 1 model in the target unit is slain.

warscrolls.name: Warstomper Mega-Gargant

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 15 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Titanic Boulderclub is 3 and this unit has a Control characteristic of 10.

abilities.name: Longshanks
abilities.effect: This unit can pass through models in non-Monster units and parts of terrain features that are less than 4" tall.

abilities.name: Hurled Body
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll is at least double the target’s Health characteristic, 1 model in that unit is slain and you can pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of this unit. Inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the target’s Health characteristic.

abilities.name: Titanic Boulderclub
abilities.effect: If all of the attacks made with this unit’s Titanic Boulderclub target the same enemy unit, for every 5 models in the target unit, add 2 to its Attacks characteristic for the rest of the phase.

abilities.name: Son of Behemat
abilities.effect: If this unit would be automatically destroyed, it is not automatically destroyed. Instead, allocate 6 damage points to it (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

warscrolls.notes: This Hero can join an eligible regiment as an Eager Lout.

warscrolls.name: Kraken-eater Mega-Gargant

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 15 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Shipwrecka Warclub is 3 and this unit has a Control characteristic of 10.

abilities.name: Get Orf Me Land!
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an objective within 1" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, move the target 2D6" to a new position on the battlefield more than 1" from all models, terrain features and other objectives.

abilities.name: Longshanks
abilities.effect: This unit can pass through models in non-Monster units and parts of terrain features that are less than 4" tall.

abilities.name: Stuff 'Em In Me Net
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn, Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll 3 dice. For each roll that is at least double the target’s Health characteristic, 1 model in the target unit is slain.

abilities.name: Sons of Behemat
abilities.effect: If this unit would be automatically destroyed, it is not automatically destroyed. Instead, allocate 6 damage points to it (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

warscrolls.notes: This Hero can join an eligible regiment as an Eager Lout.

abilities.name: 'Oo's Under The Heel Now?
abilities.effect: Each time this unit uses the ‘Gargant Charge’ ability, add 1 to the amount of mortal damage inflicted, if any, for each model in this unit.

abilities.name: Keep Up!
abilities.effect: While this unit is wholly within 12" of a friendly Mega-Gargant, this unit can use Charge abilities even if it used a Run ability in the same turn.

abilities.name: Stuff 'Em In Me Bag
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn, Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll is at least double the target’s Health characteristic, 1 model in the target unit is slain.

warscrolls.name: Beast-smasher Mega-Gargant

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 15 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Menhir Club is 3 and this unit has a Control characteristic of 10.

abilities.name: Longshanks
abilities.effect: This unit can pass through models in non-Monster units and parts of terrain features that are less than 4" tall.

abilities.name: Beast-breaking Strike
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy Monster in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: This unit can make a pile-in move. Then, roll a dice. On a 4+, inflict 5D6 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Behemoth Brawler
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of enemy Monsters while they are in combat with this unit.

abilities.name: Son of Behemat
abilities.effect: If this unit would be automatically destroyed, it is not automatically destroyed. Instead, allocate 6 damage points to it (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

warscrolls.notes: This Hero can join an eligible regiment as an Eager Lout.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 15 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Obelisk of Tor Crania is 4 and this unit has a Control characteristic of 10.

abilities.name: Power of Behemat
abilities.declare: Make a chanting roll of D6.
abilities.effect:
Pick 1 of the following effects. If the chanting roll was 10+, pick 2 instead:

Shatter the Mountains: Add 2" to the Move characteristic of friendly Sons of Behemat units for the rest of the turn.

Might of the Earth: Heal (D3) each friendly Sons of Behemat unit.

Pummel All to Dust: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to the Rend characteristic of the Obelisk of Tor Crania, Menhir Club, Fortcrusha Flail, Shipwrecka Warclub, Titanic Boulderclub and Massive Club used by friendly Sons of Behemat units.

abilities.name: Longshanks
abilities.effect: This unit can pass through models in non-Monster units and parts of terrain features that are less than 4" tall.

abilities.name: Creepers
abilities.effect: This unit cannot be picked to be the target of enemy Rampage abilities.

abilities.name: Sons of Behemat
abilities.effect: If this unit would be automatically destroyed, it is not automatically destroyed. Instead, allocate 6 damage points to it (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).
